about_the_game:
Official Discord

Join our official Discord channel via the link on the right side of the store page! Get early access to test content and share your suggestions for upcoming updates.

Overview

Welcome to Idle Immortal Journey, a thrilling adventure from mortal to ascension! Guided by a mystical ring, you will embark on a path of cultivation and discovery. Whether you prefer idle gameplay or actively exploring mysterious realms, this cultivation world is yours to conquer! Meditate to level up, farm resources, craft pills and talismans, and enjoy a seamless blend of life and cultivation. Don’t forget to dive into dungeons and loot rare treasures along the way!

Idle Gameplay

This is an idle game at heart—simple and relaxing! Just a few clicks are all you need to grow spirit herbs, craft mystical pills, mine rare materials, and forge powerful artifacts. Once you're ready, take your gear and set out to challenge enemies, collecting rare drops and treasures as you go!

Cultivation and Combat

In the world of cultivation, battles are inevitable! Will you choose the Confucian path of wisdom and swordplay, the Buddhist way of powerful staves and mystical forms, or the Taoist mastery of the five elements and heavenly thunder? Why choose? You can master them all! Study ancient texts, learn powerful skills, and engage in thrilling battles against monsters and demons. Explore multiple maps filled with diverse enemies, each with unique and rare drops that will keep you looting for hours! Equip powerful weapons and artifacts, defeat your foes, and carve your name into the annals of immortality.

Life Skills and Cultivation Arts

Cultivation isn’t all about fighting—mastering various arts is just as important! Gather rare materials from forests and mountains, grow exotic spiritual plants, brew fine teas, or craft legendary elixirs. For hands-on cultivators, you can forge powerful artifacts and inscribe talismans to aid your journey. Whether you prefer farming or crafting, you’ll find endless joy in honing your skills.

Synergy and Freedom

In Idle Immortal Journey, every skill and art supports the others, paving the way to your ultimate goal. Grow spirit plants to gather ingredients for pill crafting, use those pills to boost your combat abilities, and forge weapons from rare drops gathered in battle. No matter your playstyle, you’ll find your own path to success—cultivation here is all about freedom and creativity!

Early Access and Future Updates

The game is currently in Early Access, with exciting features like formations, puppets, and beast taming in development. We’d love to hear your ideas and suggestions—join us on Discord to share your thoughts and help shape the future of the game!

Embark on your unique journey today in Idle Immortal Journey!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 1.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic card with DX10 (Shader-Model 4.0) abilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is an IDLE cultivation game. Rise from mortal to immortal! Explore a world inspired by Confucian, Buddhist, and Taoist traditions as you master swordplay, elemental magic, or Buddhist powers. Grow spirit crops, craft items, defeat monsters, and loot treasures. Your path to immortality awaits!
